personal.name: Steven Jenkins
personal.title: Full-Stack Engineer
personal.professionalSummary: Senior Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience designing and building production-grade web applications and revenue infrastructure. Expertise in modern front-end architectures (React, Svelte/SvelteKit) and TypeScript, spanning full-stack development, payment systems integration, and AI-assisted workflows. Proven record of architecting scalable systems supporting 800+ concurrent users while achieving 99.9% uptime and reducing infrastructure costs by up to 87%, with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and minors in Mathematics and Business Administration.

experience.title: Technical Lead & Software Engineer
experience.description: Architected and deployed 7 production applications with Stripe payment integration generating monthly recurring revenue (MRR), building complete technical infrastructure from authentication through payment processing and automated billing reconciliation
highlights: Architected and deployed 7 production applications with Stripe payment integration generating monthly recurring revenue (MRR), building complete technical infrastructure from authentication through payment processing and automated billing reconciliation

Reduced infrastructure costs by 87% while scaling to 800+ concurrent users and 2,500 live stream viewers—migrated Real-Time GPS Platform from expensive provider to self-built solution using Firebase and OpenStreetMap API, maintaining 99.9% uptime across 4 consecutive production events

Built Statistical Table Tennis SaaS platform from concept to paying customers in 3 months—architected custom authentication (Lucia Auth), database layer (Drizzle ORM + SQLite), Stripe subscription billing, and front-end UI handling 500+ concurrent real-time countdown timers, customizable interface elements, oAuth integration with discord to allow scheduled reminders

Delivered zero-downtime production deployment for client CRM application after previous engineering team failed—rebuilt complete flight management system on self-managed Ubuntu server with Nginx reverse proxy, PM2 process management, UPS battery backup, and automated deployment pipeline

Designed and implemented partner API integration for equine health platform connecting Firebase backend to third-party HVMS veterinary software—automated benefit reconciliation by parsing invoice line items, updating Firestore records, and synchronizing adjustments across both systems

Led 3-person development team on Macro Exotics marketplace platform—coordinated pull request reviews, assigned features, implemented Stripe Connect for automated fund distribution to vehicle hosts, and built embedded checkout calculating dynamic pricing based on rental duration and add-ons

Rebuilt production GPS tracking system in one week when vendor changed API requirements—re-architected XML satellite feed processing, real-time database updates, and dynamic ranking calculations to support event scaling from $600K to $4.4M in fundraising

experience.title: Lead Revenue Operations Engineer
experience.description: Accelerated sales velocity by 3x while increasing annual revenue 1.8x—reduced proposal turnaround from 1-2 weeks to under 4 hours by building automated financial modeling system and leading 3-person engineering team to deliver 35+ industry-specific captive insurance calculation models
highlights: Accelerated sales velocity by 3x while increasing annual revenue 1.8x—reduced proposal turnaround from 1-2 weeks to under 4 hours by building automated financial modeling system and leading 3-person engineering team to deliver 35+ industry-specific captive insurance calculation models

Architected new business vertical generating $7M+ in annual revenue—identified market opportunity, built complete technical infrastructure including Stripe subscription platform, automated benefit management system, and venue partnership integrations that became one of company's primary revenue drivers

Designed and implemented end-to-end revenue operations infrastructure supporting individual deals exceeding $500K—built financial modeling engines, pricing calculators, automated billing systems, and contract management tools enabling company scale from $3.5M to $10M+ annually

Reduced engineering bottlenecks across organization by translating complex insurance financial requirements into automated tools—enabled non-technical sales and executive teams to independently deploy sophisticated financial models

experience.title: Solutions Engineer | Systems Administrator
experience.description: Designed and implemented custom CRM platform supporting complete sales lifecycle—defined data architecture, built REST API integrations, configured automation workflows, and created reporting dashboards used across all revenue operations
highlights: Designed and implemented custom CRM platform supporting complete sales lifecycle—defined data architecture, built REST API integrations, configured automation workflows, and created reporting dashboards used across all revenue operations

Drove organization-wide technology adoption by implementing file storage infrastructure and standardized workflows—collaborated with each department to design systems tailored to team needs while maintaining security and compliance requirements
Delivered technical training to business teams on advanced automation capabilities—taught Google Apps Script and financial automation enabling self-service for complex data operations
Established development standards including CI/CD pipeline management, testing procedures, deployment workflows, and cross-departmental handoff protocols
Managed network security, infrastructure planning, and system implementations based on cost-benefit analysis

achievements.title: Statistical Table Tennis
achievements.subtitle: Full-Stack SaaS Platform
achievements.overview: Architected and built complete production SaaS application from concept to paying customers in 3 months while managing multiple concurrent client engagements.
highlights: Sole developer: Full-stack ownership of authentication (Lucia Auth), database (Drizzle ORM + SQLite), RESTful APIs, UI/UX, and payment processing (Stripe)
Production infrastructure with 99.9% uptime on self-managed bare metal Ubuntu Server with redundant power, Nginx reverse proxy, PM2 process management
Performance engineering: Optimized front-end to smoothly render 500+ concurrent real-time countdown timers with complex conditional queries
Enterprise security: Device fingerprinting, multi-factor validation, session revocation, IP blocking, audit logging
Revenue infrastructure: Stripe subscription billing with automated payment reconciliation and customer portal
Product design: Created entire UX in Figma, translating designs to production components with customizable preferences

achievements.title: Real-Time GPS Platform
achievements.subtitle: Scalable Event Infrastructure
achievements.overview: Architected real-time tracking platform utilizing GPS location and metadata, associating individual devices to information including team name, last update time, and dynamically calculated race position.
highlights: Technical achievement: 800+ concurrent users, 2,500+ livestream viewers, 99.9% uptime, $0.13 total infrastructure cost
System design: XML satellite feed processing, real-time database updates, dynamic ranking calculations, API endpoint design
Rebuilt complete system one week before production event when GPS provider changed API requirements
Maintained production system for 4 consecutive years with ongoing technical ownership
Event scaling: Platform supported event growth from $600k to $4.4M in fundraising

achievements.title: Macro Exotics
achievements.subtitle: Exotic Vehicle Rental Platform
achievements.overview: Full-stack ownership: Designed and implemented every layer including Firebase Authentication, Firestore database, RESTful API endpoints, front-end UI/UX with Svelte 5, and Stripe payment processing.
highlights: Revenue infrastructure: Implemented embedded Stripe checkout invoicing based on transaction parameters (price, duration, addons)
Vehicle owners prompted to create Stripe connect accounts which receive transfers after rental completion and disbursement calculations
Product design: Created entire UX in Figma, translating designs directly to production-ready components
Project Manager: Responsible for assigning work and reviewing pull requests for production codebase changes

achievements.title: Wrench Totalcare Plus
achievements.subtitle: Complete System Architecture & iOS Application
achievements.overview: Full-stack ownership: Designed and implemented every layer including Firebase Authentication, Firestore database architecture, RESTful API endpoints, front-end UI/UX, and Stripe payment processing.
highlights: Revenue infrastructure: Embedded Stripe checkout invoicing with dynamic pricing based on transaction parameters, vehicle owners create connect accounts for automated fund transfers
Product design: Created entire UX in Figma, translating designs directly to production-ready components
Project Manager: Assigned work and reviewed pull requests for production codebase and live applications
External API endpoints with unique API keys and permissions per partner, utilizing SvelteKit
Isolated QA environment: Completely isolated testing infrastructure building alongside production for third-party developers
JWT-based token management for backward communication on completion of various customer steps

achievements.title: Payment Processing & Subscription Platform
achievements.subtitle: Financial Technology Infrastructure
achievements.overview: Architected subscription wellness platform generating $250,000 in revenue with Stripe API integration for subscription management, automated billing, and recurring payments.
highlights: Financial automation: Built payment reconciliation system calculating per-customer revenue transfers based on invoice line items
System components: RESTful API layer, admin dashboard, customer portal, automated benefit tracking
Third-party integration: HVMS practice management API for automated reimbursements
Led complete technical implementation from requirements through production deployment

achievements.title: Enterprise Technology Infrastructure
achievements.subtitle: Complete System Architecture
achievements.overview: Complete technical leadership for disaster consulting startup scaling to $6-9M revenue. Led all technology decisions from founding through 80+ employee scale.
highlights: Architected web infrastructure, automated systems, and enterprise integrations (Google Sheets API)
Executed enterprise migration of 80-100 accounts with zero downtime or data loss
Served as dedicated engineering leadership handling infrastructure, security, and strategic planning
Made build vs. buy decisions for employee management, job postings, and internal systems
Coordinated implementation across remote teams and multiple departments
